---
id: update-layout
title: "UpdateLayout"
description: "During the recording process, you can call this API at any time to change the stream mixing layout settings."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/cloud_recording/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>UpdateLayout</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


During the recording process, you can call this API at any time to change the stream mixing layout settings.

<Note title="Note">Call frequency limit: 10 times/second</Note>

## Request
<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"Action","in":"query","description":"> API prototype parameter\n>\n> https://cloudrecord-api.zego.im?Action=UpdateLayout\n","required":true,"allowEmptyValue":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["UpdateLayout"]},"style":"form","explode":true}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"AppId","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Common parameter. Application ID, a unique credential assigned by ZEGOCLOUD. You can obtain it from the <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"https://console.zegocloud.com/\">ZEGOCLOUD Console</a>.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"uint32"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"SignatureNonce","in":"query","description":"ðŸ’¡Common parameter. A 16-character hexadecimal random string (hex encoding of an 8-byte random number). schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Recording task ID, a fixed-length string of 16 bytes.","example":"xxxx"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"MixMode"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`1`, `2`, `3`, `4`, `5`]"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Layout mode.\n\n- 1: Custom layout, MixInputList must be specified\n- 2: Equal division layout (default)\n- 3: Horizontal layout\n- 4: Vertical layout\n- 5: Floating layout\n","enum":[1,2,3,4,5],"default":2}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>MixInputList</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object[]</span></span></summary><div className={"opening-array-bracket"}><span className={"opening-array-bracket_text"}>Array</span><span className={"opening-array-bracket_symbol"}>[</span></div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"StreamId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Specifies the streamID to be displayed in this view. If not specified, streams will be matched in the order they join the room.\n","example":"xxxx"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ViewType"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`1`, `2`]"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The type of content displayed in this view.\n\n- 1: Audio and video (default)\n- 2: Whiteboard\n\nType 2 is only valid when whiteboard recording is enabled. Only one view can be set as whiteboard; setting two or more will return an error.\n","enum":[1,2],"default":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Top"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 1920`"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The y-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of this view on the canvas. Value range is [0, 1920], cannot exceed the Bottom value and the canvas height.\n","minimum":0,"maximum":1920,"example":0}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Left"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 1920`"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The x-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of this view on the canvas. Value range is [0, 1920], cannot exceed the Right value and the canvas width.\n","minimum":0,"maximum":1920,"example":0}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Bottom"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 1920`"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The y-axis coordinate of the bottom-right corner of this view on the canvas. Value range is [0, 1920], cannot exceed the canvas height.\n","minimum":0,"maximum":1920,"example":720}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Right"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** `>= 0` and `<= 1920`"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The x-axis coordinate of the bottom-right corner of this view on the canvas. Value range is [0, 1920], cannot exceed the canvas width.\n","minimum":0,"maximum":1920,"example":540}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"Layer"} required={true} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"The layer priority of this view. When two views overlap, the one with a larger value is displayed on top.","example":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"FillMode"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`1`, `2`]"} schema={{"type":"integer","description":"How to handle when the actual video stream aspect ratio is inconsistent with the view.\n\n- 1: Crop mode. In this mode, priority is given to ensuring the view is filled. After the original video is scaled proportionally to fill the view, content exceeding the view on all sides will be cropped. (Default)\n- 2: Scale mode. In this mode, priority is given to ensuring the integrity of the original video. After the original video is scaled proportionally to fill the view, black borders will be added on all sides.\n","enum":[1,2],"default":1}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"BackgroundImage"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"The URL address of the stream view background image, only takes effect when the [StreamId] parameter is specified. This background image will be displayed when the stream specified in the custom layout does not exist or the stream is interrupted.\n\n- It is recommended that the background image resolution matches the stream view resolution. If the two resolutions are inconsistent, the background image will be stretched or compressed to fill the entire view.\n- Background image format supports JPG and PNG, size cannot exceed 5MB. If the background image download fails, the setting will not take effect.\n- URL supports HTTP and HTTPS protocols.\n"}}></SchemaItem><li className={"closing-array-bracket-container"}><div className={"closing-array-bracket"}>]</div></li></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"MixMaxResolutionStreamId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"When `MixMode` is set to 3, 4, or 5, used to specify the stream ID to display in the large view.\n","example":"stream_1"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs>
